meanings.definition: The quality or state of being regal.
meanings.sent1: Her regalnesses shone through as she greeted the guests with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The queen's regalnesses were evident in her elegant attire and graceful demeanor.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the regalnesses of the lion by walking with a proud strut.
meanings.sent4: The regalnesses of the ancient castle were a reminder of its majestic past.
meanings.sent5: The regalnesses of the mountain peak took my breath away as the sun set behind it.

meanings.definition: The regal attributes or characteristics of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The horse's regalnesses were admired by all who saw its graceful movements.
meanings.sent2: The regalnesses of the old oak tree made it stand out among the other trees in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried to imitate the regalnesses of the older dogs by sitting up straight and proud.
meanings.sent4: The regalnesses of the antique vase made it a prized possession in the collector's eyes.
meanings.sent5: The regalnesses of the historic building captured the attention of all who passed by.
